pronunciation.pinyin: ā bà zàng zú qiāng zú zì zhì zhōu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1

meanings.value: Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture (Tibetan: rnga ba bod rigs cha'ng rigs rang skyong khul, formerly in Kham province of Tibet), northwest Sichuan, capital Barkam 馬爾康鎮|马尔康镇[Ma3 er3 kang1 zhen4]
